message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"expensive; costs a lot of money","sentence":"这个饭很贵。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animated scene: a simple restaurant table with a steaming bowl of food and a large price tag showing an expensive amount. The background has gentle, surreal post-apocalyptic hues (soft pastel colors with gentle ruins), but the focus is on the food and price. The atmosphere is both dreamy and slightly enigmatic, with subtle animated lighting effects. No people are present.","sentence_translation":"This meal is expensive."}
